column4: hi guys i have a big problem...i want to install wicd network manager....i have uninstall ubuntu network-manager daemon and now i cant connect to internet any more....i had download the network-manager to reinstall but in the ./configure it tell me the error "cant found gettext tool"....so i had download the gettext package and the ./configure works fine...but in make after some time it tell me an error and i cant finish the

ï»¿hi guys i have a big problem...i want to install wicd network manager....i have uninstall ubuntu network-manager daemon and now i cant connect to internet any more....i had download the network-manager to reinstall but in the ./configure it tell me the error "cant found gettext tool"....so i had download the gettext package and the ./configure works fine...but in make after some time it tell me an error and i cant finish
cant u reinstall package?
look in here: ls /var/cache/apt/archives/
ok. if u type sudo apt-get install [packagename] what other depepdencies does it require?
i can't use apt-get...beacuase i'm out of internet.....uninstalling network-manager now i can't connet to internet
u on win?
ok. try it anyway then.... to see if other dependencies . . . .
that way u can download and transfer via usb drive...?
i dont know the package name
if u do it with synaptic . . .  you'l have a window with errors for each *.deb file
the package named "network-manager" but if i try "sudo apt-get network-manager" it tells me "Invalid operation network-manager"
yeah . . .you should have each package needed mentioned there
yeah.... u have a list of .deb files there?
when you type sudo apt-get install network-manager...... what packages does it fail to download?
ok.
are you there??

ok :) good luck. and remember to copy with sudo, u wont have the rights as normal user ...
